column2: Tumor bulk on right side; unable to open right eye; slightly hunched
DCT-TVA; Braf; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, primary tumor,spleen
Tumor was solid and fairly large; grew prominently on the right side of skull; skull was still in tact; a cell line attempted; H&L looked healthy upon visual inspection; a vial for cryo was obtained.
